name.en: Special Topic: Genetic Basis of Embryogenesis in Drosophila
name.ch: 專題研究:基礎果蠅遺傳學與胚胎發育

goal.ch: 果蠅多樣的遺傳操做工具使得果蠅成為生命科學研究中最重要的模型生物之一。因此精通果蠅的遺傳學對於以果蠅作為研究工具之研究者，是不可缺的習題。本課程將提供學生以果蠅為研究工具所必要的知識。
goal.en: "The genetic tools of Drosophila melanogaster make Drosophila become one of the most important model organisms in early development researches. Therefore, it is necessary to understand the details of the genetic tools in Drosophila. This course will provide the essential knowledge for students to use Drosophila as model in their research projects."

outline.ch:
"1. Introduction
2 ~ 5. Drosophila Embryogenesis
6 ~ 9. Drosophila genetics
10 ~ 13. Drosophila genomics
14 ~ 18. Mutagenesis"
